column5: Two beautifully decorated bedrooms with queen beds and televisions in each Private bathroom with a Keurigg Coffee Maker. Excellent quality of linens and towels. Compare your visit and aminities here to the finest hotels! Ideal for business professionals.  My room is on opposite side of house as to not disrupt one another.    5 minutes to Historic downtown Grapevine or Southlake Town Square. Gaylord Texan Resort is 5 miles. DFW airport is 10 miles. Halfway between Dallas and Fort Worth.
column8: Lots of Privacy in Beautiful Home Near The Lake
